channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Anomalous Subsurface Environment (ASE1)
channel.description:
The newest episode of Fear of a Black Dragon is here. In this one, @Coalhada and I are getting gonzo in the Anomalous Subsurface Environment!
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/anomalous-subsurface-environment-ase1
![black-dragon-logo-web-800x800-72dpi|500x500](upload://yFDCGlEOsXNCgVGJcSVhoREBO8D.jpeg)

item.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Anomalous Subsurface Environment (ASE1)
item.dc:creator: @seanFsmith
item.description:
@seanFsmith wrote:

I’m with @Coalhada here - Who is good because it is “has been” bad. It was a significant twist back in the eighties when you could no longer evade the Daleks by ascending a single flight of stairs.

The “legitimate absurdity, legitimate threat” combo is one I’m a huge fan of in the Discworld books, which is probably the single biggest influence on my fantasy game worlds.

Read full topic
item.source: Fear of a Black Dragon - Anomalous Subsurface Environment (ASE1)

item.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Anomalous Subsurface Environment (ASE1)
item.dc:creator: @Gus.L
item.description:
@Gus.L wrote:

One of my all time favorite settings and an amazing bit of mega-dungeon!

I should add that we do have a decent idea of what’s in the deeper levels - both from ASE 2 and from Patrick’s the blog henchmanabuse.

Read full topic
